neckTurnGain.Wiki: Swing gain. The higher it is, the faster it spins.

minAnkleHeightMS.Wiki: Minimum Height at which Ankle is raised

maxAnkleHeightMS.Wiki: Maximum Height at which Ankle is raised

cosineMaxKneeAngle.Wiki: Maximum angle at which the knee can be bent (cosine value)

cosineMinKneeAngle.Wiki: Minimum angle at which the knee can be bent (cosine value)

footPlantedAnkleHeightMS.Wiki: The lowest position assuming that the ankles are attached

footRaisedAnkleHeightMS.Wiki: Highest position assuming ankles are apart

raycastDistanceUp.Wiki: How high above the ankle should you cast the ray?

raycastDistanceDown.Wiki: How far below the ankle should you ray cast?

onOffGain.Wiki: Gain when turning foot contact on and off

footRaisedGain.Wiki: Gain when the foot is raised

footPlantedGain.Wiki: Gain when foot touches the ground

useFootLocking.Wiki: Do you want to lock (fix?) your feet/ankles?

twistKneeAxisType.Wiki: Axial direction of knee joint for twisting

neckTurnPriority.Wiki: The lower it is, the faster it will turn. -1 does not shake the head

neckTurnMaxAngle.Wiki: Maximum rotation angle for this joint. Can't bend beyond this angle
